title: I can't play ... i login  and it say something wrong with my sever ........
body: Someone ave same problem like me ? Riot Help me ASAP plzzz{{summoner:6}}

replies.body:
I'm not entirely sure what error you may be seeing, but if it says anything related to connection, there's a good chance there's an issue with your route to the servers. Hit up our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for a list of steps that commonly resolve these types of errors.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
